mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.socode as "socode", a.soseq as "soseq", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.id AS "p.id", a.dept AS "dept.id", a.status as "status", a.type as "type", a.no AS "no", a.cinv_code AS "cinv.code", a.cinv_name AS "cinvname", a.std AS "std", a.unit AS "unit", a.num AS "num", a.donenum as "donenum", a.start_date AS "startdate", a.end_date AS "enddate", a.batchno as "batchno", a.ischaidan as "ischaidan", p.code as "p.code", dept.name AS "dept.name"
left join business_shengchan_dingdan p on p.id = a.pid LEFT JOIN sys_office dept ON dept.id = a.dept
mapper.select: select p.code as "p.code", a.no AS "no" FROM business_shengchan_dingdan_mingxi a left join business_shengchan_dingdan p on p.id = a.pid where a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO business_shengchan_dingdan_mingxi( id,ischaidan, socode, soseq, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, pid, no, cinv_code, cinv_name, std, unit, num,donenum,batchno, start_date, end_date,dept,type,status ) VALUES ( #{id},'未拆单', #{socode}, #{soseq}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{p.id}, #{no}, #{cinv.code}, #{cinvname}, #{std}, #{unit}, #{num},0,#{batchno}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{dept.id},#{type},#{status} ) on duplicate key update id = values(id), update_date= VALUES(update_date), cinv_code = values(cinv_code), cinv_name = values(cinv_name), no=VALUES(no), batchno=VALUES(batchno), start_date=VALUES(start_date), end_date=VALUES(end_date), std=VALUES(std), num=VALUES(num), unit=VALUES(unit), dept = values(dept)
mapper.update: UPDATE business_shengchan_dingdan_mingxi SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, pid = #{p.id}, no = #{no}, cinv_code = #{cinv.code}, cinv_name = #{cinvname}, std = #{std}, unit = #{unit}, num = #{num}, batchno = #{batchno}, type = #{type}, dept = #{dept.id}, status = #{status}, start_date = #{startdate}, end_date = #{enddate} WHERE id = #{id}
